We also should apply the same model as we selected in the connection check, so we can fail early on it.

Also it is a good idea to use exponential increase in retry interval.
title: In solve command we should retry on `"text": "API Error: 500 {\"type\":\"error\",\"error\":{\"type\":\"api_error\",\"message\":\"Overloaded\"},\"request_id\":null}"`
